Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
com.tms.service.ClientService
@Service public class ClientService extends Object
ClientService is a class, that has a connection to ClientRepositoryinvalid input: '<'/> performs crud operations associated with the table clientsinvalid input: '<'/>
